title: Belize Bank Mobile & Web App
preview: Participated as a Frontend Developer building both the mobile banking app and its complementary web platform for Belize Bank. Contributed to secure interfaces, modern UI, and optimized customer experience.
description: I participated as a Frontend Developer for the Belize Bank mobile and web banking applications. My responsibilities included implementing secure data-transfer methods, building responsive and user-friendly interfaces, and applying best practices in performance, accessibility, and frontend architecture. Worked closely with security teams to ensure compliance with financial standards, contributing to a stable and professional digital banking experience used by thousands of customers.

title: Bombastic UI Library
preview: Bombastic UI is a modern, open-source component library built to be fast, accessible, and framework-agnostic for JavaScript ecosystems.
description: Bombastic UI is an open-source component library offering reusable, customizable, and performant UI components compatible with multiple JavaScript frameworks. I contributed by designing and developing new components, optimizing performance, and expanding documentation. The library focuses on developer experience, theming flexibility, clean API design, and modern UI patterns, enabling teams to build faster and more consistent interfaces.

title: Feria Solidaridad
preview: Feria de la solidaridad it's a project that I made for my social service at my university. The goal of this project was to create a website where university students can explore the different options available for completing their social service.
description: Feria de la solidaridad it's a project that I made for my social service at my university, where I built a website that helps university students explore and choose from multiple social service opportunities.
